title: No Howling Abyss Music?
body:
The Howling Abyss music isn't playing for me during ARAM games. Yes, the volume is on. Yes, the music volume is on. I think it hasn't been working for awhile, at least for me. I asked my team if they heard the music last night and they said yes. I was playing DJ Sona on the map and her music played fine and then the next game the music volume was still on and at 100 but no Howling Abyss music played.

What's going on? =(

Also will  note that the SR music plays fine for me.

replies.body: Is this sudden or has it been happening a while?  If you recently did an update then the specific game file could not be rendering.  In this case, you should be able to run a repair or do so through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Let me know if that helps!
